title: ESLint Target
description: ESLint target options for Build Facade.

eslintConfig.description: The name of the ESLint configuration file.

fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

cacheLocation.description: Path to the cache file or directory.

outputFile.description: File to write report to instead of the console.

cacheStrategy.description: Strategy to use for detecting changed files in the cache.

force.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

maxWarnings.description: Number of warnings to trigger nonzero exit code.

lintFilePatterns.description: One or more files/dirs/globs to pass directly to ESLint's `lintFiles()` method.

noEslintrc.description: The equivalent of the `--no-eslintrc` flag on the ESLint CLI, it is false by default

rulesdir.description: The equivalent of the `--rulesdir` flag on the ESLint CLI, it is an empty array by default

resolvePluginsRelativeTo.description: The equivalent of the `--resolve-plugins-relative-to` flag on the ESLint CLI

reportUnusedDisableDirectives.description: The equivalent of the `--report-unused-disable-directives` flag on the ESLint CLI.
